title: Architectures of Modern Front-End Applications
description: Learn about the different architectures of modern front-end applications, from classic to modular to Feature Sliced Design (FSD). Understand the pros and cons of each approach, best practices for organizing code, and how to choose the right architecture for your project's needs. Includes practical examples and diagrams.
